description:
An efficient climber and a beast on the descents, this bike will eat up any trail you put in front of it. SRAM's Eagle SX groupset is a solid performer, with excellent power transfer and fast, crisp gear changes. An extra-special ingredient in this rig is the RockShox 35 Gold RL, a durable, capable fork for taking drops and descents confidently. 29er wheels have the rolling momentum to charge over rock gardens and let it rip when the way opens up.

  • SmartForm C1 alloy frame, with a slack headtube angle and versatile trail geometry
  • RockShox 35 Gold RL suspension fork, with 140mm of travel
  • RockShox Deluxe Select rear shock, with 130mm of travel
  • 1x12 drive train pairs a 30T chain ring with an 11-50T cassette
  • SRAM Eagle SX groupset, with SRAM X1-1000 crankset
  • Shimano hydraulic disc brakes, with big 180mm rotors front and back
  • Dropper seat post with bar mounted control lever
  • Front tire: Maxxis Minion DHF 29 x 2.5 (tubeless ready)
  • Rear tire: Maxxis Dissector 29 x 2.4 (tubeless ready)
  • Bikes are covered by MEC's Rocksolid Guarantee and Bike Service Agreement. You can bring your bike to any MEC bike shop for free adjustments and minor maintenance for two years after purchase
  • Due to challenges with supply chain, components may be substituted for comparable parts at any time. The listed build is how MEC intended your bike to arrive, though the manufacturer may need to make a tweak or two to get you riding sooner
name: Cannondale Habit 4 Bicycle - Unisex

value: Maxxis Minion DHF 3C MaxxTerra Exo 29 x 2.5 / Maxxis Dissector Exo 29 x 2.4
